name: ChantChantDevilution
description:
Chant Chant Devilution is remix of the Overcooked formula. 4 players use controllers to run their cultists around the basement, collect ingredients and perform rituals in order to eventually summon a demon. Players use the attached grimoire pdf in order to figure out the rituals and chants needed in order to complete the summoning.

Controls:

Left Stick, Move

Pick Up object: X

Drop Object: O

Hold Left trigger (While on chanting pad) + X, square, circle or triangle chant

Bumpers: (while on alter) switch ritual.
